statements: UPDATE tax_records SET tax_liability = 5000 WHERE record_id = 1;
UPDATE tax_records SET taxable_income = 75000, tax_year = 2021 WHERE record_id = 3;
UPDATE tax_records SET tax_liability = 5000 WHERE record_id = 100;
UPDATE tax_records SET taxable_income = 75000, tax_year = 2022 WHERE taxpayer_name = 'John Doe' AND tax_year = 2021;
UPDATE tax_records SET income = 50000, deduction = 10000 WHERE taxpayer_id = 123 AND tax_year = 2020;
UPDATE tax_calculations SET tax_due = 7500.50, tax_paid = 6500.25 WHERE record_id = 456 AND tax_year = 2019;
UPDATE tax_records SET income = 75000.50, deduction = 12000.25 WHERE record_id = 100;
UPDATE tax_calculations SET tax_due = 15000.75, tax_paid = 11000.50 WHERE record_id = 200 AND tax_year = 2021;
UPDATE tax_records SET total_income = 50000.00, tax_liability = 8000.00 WHERE record_id = 101;
UPDATE tax_calculations SET deductions = 500.00, tax_amount = 6000.00 WHERE calculation_id = 201;
UPDATE tax_records SET tax_liability = tax_liability * 1.1 WHERE total_income > 10000
UPDATE tax_calculations SET tax_amount = taxable_income * tax_rate - deductions WHERE taxable_income > 5000
UPDATE TaxRecords SET income = 75000, tax_due = 15000 WHERE record_id = 1;
UPDATE TaxPayments SET payment_amount = 20000, payment_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE payment_id = 3;
UPDATE TaxRecords SET tax_due = income * 0.2, tax_year = 2022 WHERE taxpayer_id = 1001;
UPDATE TaxPayments SET payment_amount = payment_amount + 500.50, payment_date = '2022-04-15' WHERE record_id = 2001;
UPDATE tax_records SET tax_due = 7500 WHERE id = 100
UPDATE tax_payments SET amount = 500.25, payment_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE id = 50
UPDATE tax_records SET tax_due = 3000.50, payment_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE id = 101
